Reviews.Title: Good Messaging phone
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: I own this phone already and love it so much that I bought another to share. Great phone! Nice needed apps.

Reviews.Title: Cool but not over the top kind of phone
Reviews.Author: Alan A. Barriga
Reviews.Content: it looks and feels great, its skinny and lightweight, alot of cool options and other stuff, the camera is pretty good with focus and flash and not too expensive like a smartphone

Reviews.Title: samaung mythic gsm phone unlocked
Reviews.Author: susie q "susan"
Reviews.Content: It does not hold a charge  and when on charger seems to start to beep that the charge is done already within a very short few minutes.

ProductInfo.Features:
Enjoy one-touch access to popular social networks like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube, plus sync up your contact and calendar info
Get organized and entertained with widgets, accessible through the versatile Widget Bar on your phone
Samsung Simulations takes you through an Audio-Visual tour of the most common device/phone features. Choose the topic, sit back, and learn at your own pace, time and convenience, from anywhere there's an Internet connection.
Product Dimensions - 4.49 (L) x 2.0 (W) x 0.5 (D) Height, width and depth of the phone, measured in inches (in.).
Weight - 3.8 oz.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Mythic GSM Cell Phone Unlocked
